name: DDPLANPingPongMadness
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: We are a team of ping pong enthusiasts who’ve been training, competing and overall captivated by the world of table tennis for years. We created a website to review some of the best models out there and showcase their features, pros, and cons to the everyday person. We hope that our content helps you find the right product or master the right technique on your ping pong adventure! We also in will brief you on some tips on how you can raise your ping game to the next level.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
